H0.text: What is the name of Humphrey Bogart’s character in the film ‘Casablanca’. Rick Blaine

H1.text: What is the name of Humphrey Bogart’s character in the film ‘Casablanca’. Sam Spade

H2.text: What is the name of Humphrey Bogart’s character in the film ‘Casablanca’. Philip Marlowe

H3.text: What is the name of Humphrey Bogart’s character in the film ‘Casablanca’. Ilsa Lund

A4.text: The screenplay is based on Everybody Comes to Rick's, an unproduced stage play by Murray Burnett and Joan Alison.

A5.text: Bogart played his first romantic lead in Casablanca (1942): Rick Blaine, an expatriate nightclub owner hiding from a suspicious past and negotiating a fine line among Nazis, the French underground, the Vichy prefect and unresolved feelings for his ex-girlfriend.
